long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This item is an annotator that is used to highlight or colorize text in articles or browsers to make reading easier and more organized. It is a simple and basic annotator with a highlight function, including five different colors, and a colorize function that color codes the text based on section, such as headers and paragraphs.
